message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value. This product is worth more than $120 to me, and I believe it holds significant benefits for you as well. Considering its quality and the unique features it offers, I would like to extend an offer of $150 for this item. I'm looking forward to your response.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on your product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the $150 price point. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $130 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and respect your decision. To find a middle ground, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $140 for the product. This price reflects the value I place on the item while considering your budgetary constraints. I hope this proposal is acceptable to you.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Given my budget, I would like to propose a counter-counteroffer of $135 for the product. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise between the value you place on the item and my financial constraints. I hope we can reach an agreement.
